DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect back care pillow , adjective standard physical therapy treatment chronic non-specific low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Back Care Pillow Addition Physical Therapy Chronic Non-specific Low Back Pain Treatment
DOC.criteria: Males female Age 20 69 year old . Patients daily routine long bend sit stand position least 2 hour per day Patients low back pain pain 3 month Patients pain low back without refer leg Patients moderate severe pain numerical rating scale ( pain score â‰¥ 4 ) Pregnant patient Underlying systematic visceral disease , specific condition neoplasm , ankylose spondylitis , previous low back surgery Patients Quada equine syndrome Patients nerve root symptom ( neurological deficit ) 1 . Patient refer pain leg area dermatome problem . 2 . Abnormal reflex low extremity . 3 . Muscle weakness area myotome problem .
